entry.title: New release for Fider: v0.22.0
entry.content:
Docker image getfider/fider:0.22.0 is now available to use. Docker image getfider/fider:stable is now the same as getfider/fider:0.22.0

What's Changed

  • fix: broken markdown in README.md by @DevScyu in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1085
  • add greek language by @goenning in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1103
  • Fix typo in Welcome Message section by @myarmolinsky in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1111
  • update to go 1.19 and node 18.x by @goenning in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1118
  • Scrollbars would always be visible in the VotesModal component by @Ik1497 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1134
  • Member email search by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1172
  • Added migration to create missing posts.user_id index by @mway-niels in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1169
  • fix: setting default "view" query params to "all" by @npham49 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1175
  • Go and node version updates. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1167
  • refactor: Migrate Select component to functional component using useState hook by @npham49 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1176
  • Fix: changing go version in go.mod back to 1.22.0 by @npham49 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1178
  • Update FUNDING.yml by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1177
  • feat: add Arabic locales by @maherelgamil in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1180
  • Update the Github action to push docker images on tag pushes by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1182
  • Another way to trigger on tag/releases. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1188

New Contributors

  • @DevScyu made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1085
  • @myarmolinsky made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1111

  • @mway-niels made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1169
  • @npham49 made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1175
  • @maherelgamil made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1180

entry.title: New release for Fider: v0.23.0
entry.content:
Overview

  • UI changes and improvements. This shouldn't cause much issues with any existing custom CSS but exercise caution with that one.
  • Notifications is now a drop down menu rather than a separate page
  • Emoji-reactions to comments. There are now github-style emoji reactions that can be applied to comments.
  • Dockerfile image updated to debian bookworm
  • Minor bug fixes

What's Changed (Auto-Generated)

  • Dependabot batch 20240912 by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1200
  • chore(deps): bump ws by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1183
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/image from 0.0.0-20211028202545-6944b10bf410 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1184
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @babel/traverse from 7.17.10 to 7.25.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1187
  • chore(deps-dev): bump webpack from 5.72.0 to 5.94.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1191
  • chore(deps): bump json5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1201
  • Update contributing doc by @Quentinchampenois in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1197
  • Userlist Integration by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1194
  • feature: add ability to copy comment link by @indyteo in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/981
  • Fixed gravatar for usernames with unusual characters by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1205
  • Fix: No webhook message when post deleted with no comment. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1207
  • Remove the paddle webhooks from CSRF checks. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1212
  • First set of proposed UI tweaks. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1208
  • Github-style emoji reactions to comments. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1214

entry.title: New release for Fider: v0.24.0
entry.content:

This release see's the addition of support for Italian (many thanks to Hermann Thierry Marquiand @Rudolfet) and Chinese (many thanks to 仙君御) - these translations were contributed via Crowdin.

What's Changed

  • Language translations by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1219 Full Changelog: https://github.com/getfider/fider/compare/v0.23.0...v0.24.0

entry.title: New release for Fider: v0.25.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

The main changes are the introduction of a new rich text comment editor (and re-working of the mentions logic to support that). Also there are some bugs fixed (see below for more details), and some lib updates.

  • UI changes by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1237
  • Mentions by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1230
  • Remove the welcome email. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1252
  • Removed trial emails by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1253
  • Add comment id to the webhook for new comment. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1261
  • Redirect Vuln in signout link by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1258
  • Markdown render bugs by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1249
  • Featured comment editor by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1255
  • Bump @babel/runtime from 7.26.0 to 7.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1268
  • Bump esbuild from 0.14.38 to 0.25.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1267
  • Bump dompurify from 2.5.7 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1266

New Contributors

  • @MercierMateo made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1221
  • @ShiftedMr made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getfider/fider/compare/v0.24.0...v0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Fider: v0.26.0
entry.content:
Ok - we've got dark mode support now, and lot's of other goodies..

High-level overview

  • Dark / Light mode support
  • Much improved UI to assign posts to tags
  • Support for RTL languages (Arabic for now)
  • Language translation fixes, and Arabic language support
  • A new UI for the sign-in modal - making it more modern looking

What's Changed According to Github

  • Making the TagsPanel a custom Multi-Select component by @npham49 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1276
  • Don't show the edit link if no permissions. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1278
  • Sourcing the fonts from the inter NPM package by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1293
  • Dark mode! by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1292
  • Changed notification to use link by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1274
  • Refactor SCSS for RTL Support by @Bilker1422 in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1291
  • Theming tweaks by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1294
  • Signin modal update. by @mattwoberts in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1275

New Contributors

  • @Bilker1422 made their first contribution in https://github.com/getfider/fider/pull/1291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getfider/fider/compare/v0.25.0...v0.26.0
